Title: Death Note
Genre: Action, Adventure, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Thriller
Writer: Charley Parlapanides (screenplay by), Vlas Parlapanides (screenplay by), Jeremy Slater (screenplay by), Tsugumi Ôba (based on "Death Note" by: In Shonen Jump), Takeshi Obata (based on "Death Note" by: In Shonen Jump)
Actors: Nat Wolff, LaKeith Stanfield, Margaret Qualley, Shea Whigham
Plot: Light Turner, a bright student, stumbles across a mystical notebook that has the power to kill any person whose name he writes in it. Light decides to launch a secret crusade to rid the streets of criminals. Soon, the student-turned-vigilante finds himself pursued by a famous detective known only by the alias L.
